ItemDescriptionNothing.text: A deep void in your pocket that yearns to be filled.

ItemDescriptionKeys.text: Oversized keyring with keys to every store. Earned over the summer. These allow entry to stores after the mall is closed.

ItemDescriptionSpecialOrder.text: Special order book for Nicky at Sunset Video.

ItemDescriptionHandwarmer.text: Electric handwarmer that was recalled for safety concerns.

ItemDescriptionLetter.text: Anonymous letter sent to Lisa warning that her store will close after this year.

ItemDescriptionLipstick.text: Sealed tube of bright red lipstick.

ItemDescriptionTickets.text: Tickets for a band called 'Green Day'. You've never heard of them.

ItemDescriptionHeadband.text: Headband with an AM/FM radio attached.

ItemDescriptionPortableTv.text: Portable B&W television. It only gets one station in the mall.

ItemDescriptionFmConverter.text: FM converter for cars that only have AM radios.

ItemDescriptionCoupons.text: Coupon for 10% off any non-sale item, February 6th only.

ItemDescriptionMysteryBox.text: It's probably best to open this later.

ItemDescriptionEarring.text: Earring that someone jammed in a coin slot.

ItemDescriptionTrophy.text: For completing a set of arbitrary tasks.
